actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution to authorize each Member, Resident Commissioner, and Delegate to hire within the monetary limits of the existing clerk hire allowance two additional clerks who are physically handicapped.

summary.text: Authorizes each Member, Resident Commissioner, and Delegate of Congress to hire two additional clerks who are physically handicapped.

titles.title: Resolution to authorize each Member, Resident Commissioner, and Delegate to hire within the monetary limits of the existing clerk hire allowance two additional clerks who are physically handicapped.
